recipes.label: Location Updated: Pier
recipes.description: The taverner and the scribe now have time to sail their boat and catch fish.

recipes.label: Conversation
recipes.description: The knight frowns: "You brought everything with you? Are you sure?" The soldier simply replies: "I'd follow you anywhere, as long as you'll have me."

recipes.label: Location Unlocked: Fort - Main Hall
recipes.description: The main hall is elaborately decorated with tapestries. The knight explains: "Before the baron left, they renovated the whole fort."

recipes.label: Location Unlocked: Fort - Dining Room
recipes.description: The knight lead them to the table: "Have some bread and wine if you're hungry. They might not be as tasty as the ones you bake. I hope you don't mind."

recipes.label: Location Unlocked: Fort - Tower
recipes.description: After showing the soldier their new bedroom, the knight stops before the stairs leading to the tower. "Get some wine for me, would you? Then we'll go up the tower together."

recipes.label: Location Unlocked: Fort - Training Yard
recipes.description: The knight kindly reminds the soldier that training is not for today. Tomorrow, they may spar as much as they want.

recipes.label: Location Unlocked: Fort - Forest
recipes.description: |emptyrecipe.fort.forest desc|

recipes.label: Location Unlocked: Fort - Trading Post
recipes.description: |emptyrecipe.fort.tradingpost desc|

recipes.label: Location Unlocked: Tavern - Keeper's Seat
recipes.description: The taverner sits in the keeper's seat. They serve bread, stew, and wine to the guests, and keep a barely legible ledger.

recipes.label: Location Updated: Tavern - Keeper's Seat
recipes.startdescription: The Taverner threatens to deduct the Minstrel's wage again if they keeps playing so horribly.
recipes.description: The Minstrel can now perform on the stage more attentively while the keeper looks after the tavern.

recipes.label: Location Unlocked: Tavern: Owners' Room - Desk
recipes.description: The scribe sits in front of the desk, reading a letter. The letter is from the baron, who agreed to rent out their fort to the knight.

recipes.label: Location Updated: Tavern: Owners' Room - Desk
recipes.description: The scribe can now contemplate on mathematics or flips the coin at the desk.

recipes.label: Location Unlocked: Tavern: Kitchen
recipes.description: Kitchen is where the tasty food and salty radish are made. But above all, it is used by the Taverner for brewing, as they can't make good bread anyway.

recipes.label: Location Unlocked: Tavern: Juniper's Seat
recipes.description: The cat rests comfortably in her usual seat. Maybe she will wander towards the tavern keeper and ask for fish soon?

recipes.label: Location Unlocked: Market
recipes.description: The Tavern’s cellar is quite empty. Their cheese and oat are completely out of stock. Either the Scribe or the Taverner needs to go to the market soon.

recipes.label: Location Unlocked: Monastry - Doctor's Tower
recipes.description: The workstation was given to the doctor by the prior. The doctor does alchemy experiments and blend herbs here. An oven, a balance, a mortar, and many crystal vials scattered around it.

recipes.label: Location Unlocked: Monastry - Garden
recipes.description: Although not so voluntarily, the Doctor was persuaded to take a look at the injured Bishop. The garden has herbs the Doctor can use for simple treatment. The Doctor can gather them with calm hands.

recipes.label: Location Unlocked: Monastry - Bishop's (Temporary) Room
recipes.description: The Infirmary is a dim, stuffy room. The Bishop lies unconsciously in bed. The Lord, sat in a chair by their bedside, is taking an uneasy nap.

recipes.label: Location Unlocked: Monastry - Prior's Room
recipes.description: The Doctor waited until almost noon to knock on The Prior’s door, and is welcomed into the room as they expected. "How’s the Bishop?" asked the Prior anxiously but expectantly. "Alive." answered the Doctor, and paused, "I think they will wake up, if they were lucky."

recipes.label: Location Unlocked: Monastry - Library and Scriptorium
recipes.description: |emptyrecipe.church.library desc|

recipes.label: Location Unlocked: Village - Vicar's Work
recipes.description: The vicar is getting ready to a day of work in the village. They hum as they walk past the cloister garden - Singing would not be appopriate once they are outside of these walls.
